person.persName: Thomas Jefferson Hall (New Orleans, Louisiana, wholesale liquor dealer and soldier)

body.p: New Orleans, Louisiana, wholesale liquor dealer and soldier. Married to Francesca Cleveland Hall. Father of Johnson F. Hall, Georgina W. Hall, James A. Hall, Beauregard Hall, Lady Hall, Dixie Hall, and Hattie Hall. Partner in the liquor wholesale dealer firm of Warren & Hall with James Warren in New Orleans in 1861. Second lieutenant in the Confederate Guards, Regiment Louisiana Volunteers, in the defense of New Orleans, in March 1862. Major and quarter-master in Harrison's Brigade of Louisiana Cavalry (Confederate) in June 1865. Surrendered as a prisoner of war and paroled in June 1865.
